A small collection of some of the easier to implement Weapon Special Qualities, set up as Conditional Modifiers.Â 

  • Agile

  • Anarchic

  • Axiomatic

  • Bane

  • Blood-Hunting

  • Breaking

  • Corrosive

  • Corrosive Burst

  • Flaming

  • Frost

  • Icy Burst

  • Merciful

  • Shock

  • Shocking Burst

  • Toxic

  • Unholy

  • Vorpal

Usage: Import and then drag and drop the Conditional Modifier from the Attack to the appropriate weapon.
